;今天是艾尔海森的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''艾尔海森！好巧呀，你今天休息吗？
:'''艾尔海森：'''不，只是午休时间出来坐坐，马上就要回去了。
:'''派蒙：'''唔…本来想着要聚一聚的。
:'''旅行者：'''那晚上见？要不要去兰巴德酒馆坐坐？
:'''艾尔海森：'''去喝一杯的话，恐怕还得多一个位置，有人今天出门没带钥匙。
:'''派蒙：'''咦，这样呀。没问题，人多更热闹~
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙什么时候这么大方了？
:'''派蒙：'''什么嘛，当然是你请客啦！

|en                 =
;Today is [[Alhaitham]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Paimon:''' Alhaitham! What a coincidence. Did you take the day off?
:'''Alhaitham:''' No, I'm just out for a walk during my lunch break. I'm heading back soon.
:'''Paimon:''' Aww... Paimon was hoping we could get a meal together.
:'''Traveler:''' What about tonight, then? Meet us at [[Lambad's Tavern]]?
:'''Alhaitham:''' If we're going out for a drink, we'll need to save a spot for one more person. Someone forgot their keys when they went out today.
:'''Paimon:''' Oh, of course. That's no problem at all~ The more the merrier!
:'''Traveler:''' Since when did Paimon become so generous?
:'''Paimon:''' What are you talking about? Of course you're the one paying, Traveler!
